typeSystemDescription.name: lipn-common-TS
typeSystemDescription.description: Common part for all LIPN type systems (top of hierarchy)

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: Identifies the annotator which has added this annotation.

featureDescription.name: runId
featureDescription.description: Can contain a user-defined identifier. This id is (usually) written by the AE which creates the annotation, in order to distinguish between different sets of concurrent annotations. It is especially useful if the same component is used several times (with different parameters for example).

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Detailed information (of any kind) about this annotation.

typeDescription.name: fr.lipn.nlptools.uima.types.Relation
typeDescription.description: Meta-annotation, i.e. annotation about existing annotation(s).

featureDescription.name: arguments
featureDescription.description: References to annotations that are concerned by this relation.

typeDescription.name: fr.lipn.nlptools.uima.types.Interpretation
typeDescription.description: Indicates ambiguity/concurrency/different possible interpretations of annotations: this annotations contains a serie of annotations which make sense together, as opposed to possible other Interpretations, each containing another such serie of annotations.

featureDescription.name: serie
featureDescription.description: References to the annotations which belong to this serie/interpretation
